donate.models module¶

class donate.models.Donation(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: django.db.models.base.Model

This Donation class is extended from the model class. So, it has all the functionality of the model class.

Attributes: name, contactNum, email, amount, trxId.

Functions: This class requires no functions.

This class is used to create objects for database entry of donation.

exception DoesNotExist¶

Bases: django.core.exceptions.ObjectDoesNotExist

exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶

Bases: django.core.exceptions.MultipleObjectsReturned

amount¶

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

A wrapper for a deferred-loading field. When the value is read from this object the first time, the query is executed.

donate.urls module¶

donate.views module¶

donate.views.donation(request)[source]¶

This method is used to retrieve the relevant user inserted value from the donation form.

It stores the retrieved data in the database.

It sends an email confirmation about receiving of the donation form.

Parameters

request (HttpResponse.) – It is a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

This method returns a html page which displays the donation received confirmation message.

Return type

HttpResponse.

donate.views.donation_form(request)[source]¶

This method is used to display the donation form.

Parameters

request (HttpResponse.) – It is a HttpResponse from user.

Returns

This method returns a html page. It returns the form for inserting relevant donation information.

Return type

HttpResponse.
